title: I Sapori di Liila
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Italian, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: All vegan restaurant located in a small town just outside Rome, easy to reach by the GRA (exit 11-Nomentana). Small, seats 20+, and the atmosphere is nice. Offers a fixed menu for around 25 euros which includes 2 first course, 2 second course, side dish, dessert, and water. Dogs can eat vegan too, for 1 euro. On Wednesdays diners receive a takeaway gift which might be a dessert or buns. Uses seasonal vegetable.
